Bought this product from Great Eastern Kolkata ----I want to say only ---Nice Camera --Zoom Quality awesome--Nice Pics etc etc
Awesome Camera with wonderful features both for amateurs & novices

I am a photographer and wished to gift a nice camera to my parents on their anniversary. However I needed to have some pro-features too in addition to the usual features. I was super delighted to read all specs of this camera but was a little skeptical if it will be delivered in time. Indeed flipkart kept its promise of timely one-day-guarantee but I was pleased to see the performance of this camera as well. With Wifi & GPS, Shutter priority mode, Aperture priority mode, manual mode and many scene modes backed up with strong battery, high density screen resolution and a very powerful flash gun (built in) it was a great deal.. what what steals the show is its 30x zoom, equivalent to roughly 700 mm on my DSLR. FULL marks to Nikon for product. FULL marks to Flipkart for delivery.
The best value-for-money Compact Super Zoom in the market

While the Coolpix S9700 may not always come out on top in the ratings & rankings of photography equipment analysts; it's perhaps the best value-for-money camera out there amongst its peers; namely the Canon PowerShot SX700 HS, the Sony CyberShot HX60, and the Panasonic Lumix TZ60.Amongst this lot, the Nikon S9700 is the best all-round performer, and is superb value for money. It's well built, boots up quickly, is reasonably fast to focus, and is an excellent outdoor performer.If there's an design quibble, it's the flash pop-up mechanism, that seems a bit fiddly and delicate. Also, personally, while the new OLED screen is brighter & sharper; I prefer the LCD screens in the older models, that give a more accurate color reproduction.On the whole, this a highly recommended travel zoom compact camera; and I would whole heartedly recommend this to the casual, holiday and party photographer, who is looking for a hassle-free reliable camera delivering consistent good quality images.
